name: Just A Dot
description:
Have you asked yourself, what would happen if just a dot was being bullied by some random bars? You would need help if that's your biggest concern lately, but hey, here's your answer! TAKE REVENGE ON THESE LOUSY BARS, SHOW THEM WHO'S THE REAL DOT!

It can be played with the mouse or using the directional and W, A, S ,D keys.
